doc.field: Series III: China-U.S. Physics Examination and Application (CUSPEA) Program
Series III: China-U.S. Physics Examination and Application (CUSPEA) Program

Series III contains materials from Larry Spruch's participation in the China-U.S. Physics Examination and Application (CUSPEA) program in the 1980s. Drafts and final copies of exams in English and Physics which Spruch helped to develop are included, as are Spruch's correspondence with other CUSPEA-affiliated physicists and the administrators of the program. A diary and ephemera from Spruch's 1985 trip to China, which was taken under the auspices of the program to interview prospective graduate students, are also included in this series.
